items.sentence: You think that Tom won't do that, don't you?
Why didn't you tell me you wouldn't do that?
Why didn't you tell me you couldn't do that?
Why didn't you do that the way I showed you?
I never said that I could understand French.
There's almost no chance this team will win.
Tom isn't sure that he has to do that again.
Where did you learn to throw that curveball?
Can you meet me at 2:30 on Monday afternoon?
There was a party at Tom's house last night.
It wouldn't be a good idea to do that today.
Are you sure you know what needs to be done?
Do you think you'll ever go to Boston again?
This is a question I should've asked before.
What did you do while you were in Australia?
I didn't feel like getting out of bed today.
Is this your car or are you just renting it?
Tom isn't drinking beer. He's drinking wine.
How much did you have to pay Tom to do that?
Some people say that computers save us time.
I hear that French isn't difficult to learn.
Tom doesn't have to come to school tomorrow.
Tom sent Christmas cards to all his friends.
Go do it before your parents get mad at you.
Mr. Jackson is our substitute teacher today.
Tom brought the child back to life with CPR.
Boil for ten minutes, stirring all the time.
Tom took an envelope from his jacket pocket.
Tom isn't studying music. He's studying art.
Nothing happened today that wasn't expected.
It's almost dawn and nothing's happened yet.
I know someday this will happen to you, too.
That's exactly the way it happened. I swear.
It may sound like a lie, but it's the truth.
No one's ever questioned my judgment before.
I won't answer any more questions right now.
Tom suggested that I should clean my office.
That restaurant is probably a little pricey.
If you don't study, you won't pass the exam.
I met another potential buyer for our house.
We were really hoping to buy a fishing boat.
We could buy a nice house with our winnings.
This is a little something I bought for you.
People have been buying me drinks all night.
I think you should buy yourself a new dress.
Is it true that man never gave you his name?
I'm willing to give you everything I've got.
Just give me what you owe me and I'll leave.
Is that old car giving you any more trouble?
Who gave you permission to give that to Tom?
This is the strangest thing I've ever eaten.
There was some half-eaten food on the table.
This medicine should help you stop coughing.
Is there something that I can help you with?
We can worry about the other problems later.
I'm sorry to bother you at a time like this.
Didn't I tell you everything would work out?
I hope you don't suffer from claustrophobia.
There's something important I must tell you.
I'm going there whether you're going or not.
I've got this thing pretty well figured out.
We need to talk about what happened tonight.
Could you come in here for a moment, please?
Tom ran too fast for me to keep up with him.
What makes you think that you can do it now?
Do you think that Tom will be here tomorrow?
I think that I can tell you what's going on.
Tom told me he won't be in Boston next week.
Tom said you're better at French than he is.
Tom said he wouldn't be in Boston next week.
Tom said he was looking for a job in Boston.
Tom said Boston was cooler than he expected.
Tom said Boston was colder than he expected.
Tom is the one who should've gone to Boston.

Both Tom and Mary are pretty good at French.
Tom and Mary are both pretty good at French.
Both Tom and I don't speak French very well.
If you come to Boston, I'll show you around.
Tom will never stop being important to Mary.

We're expecting more people to join us soon.
I'm not the man I was when you first met me.
Tom's cozy living room is full of bookcases.
Tom and Mary's home is comfortable and warm.
The next place I'm going to go to is Boston.
You need to be careful when frying potatoes.
I want to live in a French-speaking country.
What did you do when those men attacked you?
It's not polite to yell at people like that.
You still have your whole life ahead of you.
Please refrain from smoking in the elevator.
You're the only girl I've ever seen do that.
That's the reason why Tom wanted to do that.
I'm sure that this is where I parked my car.

Let's wait for a while and see what happens.
